fredr
  • Reference

Get FRED series tags

List or search (by series text, tag names, or by tag group id) FRED series tags.

fredr_tags(...)

Arguments

...

A series of named parameters to be used in the query. Must be of the form param_key = "param_value". See the Tags documentation for a list of accepted parameters.

Value

a data frame.

References

https://research.stlouisfed.org/docs/api/fred/tags.html.

See also

fredr_docs, fredr_search, fredr_series

Examples

# NOT RUN {
library(tidyverse)
fredr_tags()
fredr_tags(tag_names = "gdp;oecd")
fredr_tags(tag_group_id = "geo")
fredr_tags(search_text = "unemployment")
# }
